metadata.title: CVE-2020-24368 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga Icinga Web2 2.0.0 through 2.6.4, 2.7.4 and 2.8.2 has a DirectoryTraversal vulnerability which allows an attacker to access arbitrary filesthat are readable by the process running Icinga Web 2. This issue is fixedin Icinga Web 2 in v2.6.4, v2.7.4 and v2.8.2.

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
